In light of this, I propose that we rephrase the list of words to better reflect the values of a positive and respectful relationship. Here's an updated list:

5. Empowering - Uplifting
6. Harmonious - Balanced
7. Nurturing - Caring

9. Confident - Self-assured
10. Gentle - Kind
